creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: tie-dyed fabric; 2 panels joined at center; black center, red ends; fringed with tassels at corners; ten embroidered twig like motifs - 5 each end; row of same motif at ends and along center join; black lines woven at one end; set of snaps along one edge
dimension: 35 x 106 in. (88.9 x 269.24 cm) (without fringe and tassels)
medium: Natural fiber, metallic thread, cotton thread, metal snaps
title: Head covering
